Selling a few here (trying to list them in the right sections). Please email me for pics at [url]knitall@yahoo.com[/url]

Payment in PayPal Friends and Family, check or money order.

Cross listing so email or IM me if you want something.

Shipping depends on how many cards and where you are located.

1909-11 T206 Piedmont 350 Peaches Graham Boston PSA 3 $60 (VCP $71.25 from 2019)
